item.title: Scuba Diving - Water Sports Packages
item.description: Scuba diving is must to do adventure activity in Goa. Scuba diving Adventure at Grand Island is an experience beyond your imagination. One can explore a different world altogether. Goa is one of the prime scuba diving destinations of India. Scuba Diving offers amazing marine life, corals, reef and ship wreck. The Dive Sites are mostly shallow around Grande with visibility of 8-10 m. The Scuba diving package also includes adventure watersports activities which includes – Jetski- ride, Bumper
